subject: [Ip-health] PIJIP Event 4/23: James Love on R&D Treaty
body:
This is a multi-part message in MIME format.
--
[ Picked text/plain from multipart/alternative ]
Washington College of Law's

Program on Information Justice and Intellectual Property

Presents



James Love, Director Knowledge Ecology International

On

A New Trade Framework for Global Healthcare Research and Development



Noon-1:30pm

Washington College of Law

International Student Lounge, 6th Floor

4801 Massachusetts Ave. NW

Washington D.C.



For more information, see www.pijip.org   or
contact Sean Flynn, sflynn@wcl.american.edu.  This event will be webcast
live and archived at http://www.wcl.american.edu/pijip/webcast.cfm
